verses.name: Acts 9:33
verses.text: And there he found a certain man named Eneas, which had kept his bed eight years, and was sick of the palsy.

verses.name: Acts 9:34
verses.text: And Peter said unto him, Eneas, Jesus Christ maketh thee whole: arise, and make thy bed. And he arose immediately.

verses.name: Acts 9:35
verses.text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him, and turned to the Lord.

verses.name: Acts 9:36
verses.text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha, which by interpretation is called Dorcas: this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did.
